title: Light and easy chicken with Marsala sauce
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon garlic salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '4 boneless, skinless chicken breast fillets', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '15g butter', '75g mushrooms, sliced', '125ml marsala wine']
